divs: sighting detailsi was driving home on 11\26\10 @ 2340 hours. when i turned northbound onto my street i saw what looked like a glowing orange ball of light in the sky. the ball was moving north west slowly. it was bright but not abrasive to look it. it some what had a flame-like quality on its upper half. i followed it for 1 to 2 minutes to keep it in my field of view. after about 2 min it began to pulse from bright to dim until it became a point of light and then it went completely dark. i watched the skies for about 10 minutes to see if it would return into my field of view. it did not. during and after i felt a strange calm. i had an oddly euphoric feeling about the object.
Summary: Glowing orange ball in the sky. Appeared flame-like.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Rio Vista
This sighting has never been favorited.
